intro: An RPG that starts with meeting Chibi, the talking cat! ChokoNana!
description:
Everything in this work is made up of “little” elements.
You can enjoy a little map, a little discovery, a little story, etc. in a little time.

■Growth System
In addition to the character's level, there is also an element of growth in the weapons.
In particular, weapons will increase in lvl as well as characters if you equip them and fight, so you can enjoy more fun in battle.

■Collecting elements
Many treasure chests and animals are hidden in places that are not obvious at a glance, so you can search for them as you explore.
Also, there are materials in each map, and by collecting them, you can craft and strengthen your weapons.

■Story
In this world, the cat tribe is hated by all creatures without exception.
A silver-haired woman is searching for a way to coexist with the cat tribe.
The story is about their “little adventure to realize the world they envisioned.
